channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Post Content XMLRPC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Post Content XMLRPC

item.title: CVE-2021-24629|2024-08-03T19:35:20.301Z -- unknown -- post%20content%20xmlrpc
item.description: The Post Content XMLRPC WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not sanitise or escape multiple GET/POST parameters before using them in SQL statements in the admin dashboard, leading to an authenticated SQL Injections
